summary: REQ-31 is partially implemented: SITE_CONFIG.url was updated to the requested primary URL, but the diff summary does not provide evidence that all draft URL and www-variant references were removed project-wide from user-facing UI copy/links/metadata.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the application does not display or reference the draft URL "https://significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz/" anywhere in frontend source code or user-facing text (project-wide).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows only a change to `frontend/src/config/site.ts` and does not show any removals/updates in other files that would eliminate existing draft-URL occurrences. With the provided evidence, compliance with the project-wide 'no occurrences' acceptance criterion cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the application does not display or reference the "https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" variant as the primary site URL anywhere in frontend source code or user-facing text (project-wide).
missing_requirements.reason: Only `SITE_CONFIG.url` is shown as updated; there is no evidence in the diff summary of updates/removals across the rest of the frontend to eliminate any existing `https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz` occurrences. The acceptance criterion requires project-wide absence, which cannot be confirmed from the diff summary.
